author: jimmygchen
content:
For anyone interested in testing 4844, here's a docker-compose script to start a lighthouse/geth node on devnet v5
https://github.com/jimmygchen/eip4844-devnet
Some docs for testing (send / download blobs)
https://hackmd.io/@jimmygchen/H1XUtBIfn
